entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
